item.description: Hi everyone, In our last meet-up at Andala Cafe, we decided it would be fun head out for dinner for the next meet-up. It seems everyone was interested in keeping the Middle Eastern theme so here are a couple restaurants I suggest to keep it simple. 1. Cafe Barada (www.cafebarada.net), Cambridge 2. Pasha Restaurant (www.pashaturkish.com), North Cambridge -Michael
item.name: Next Meetup Venues
